ValidationRule.description: US-0007807 US-0009222 - [Contracts] - Users required to input "Volume Discount" % when uploading file or amending contract
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK( VolumeDiscounts__c ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'EBH_ListingAgreement', ISPICKVAL(PricingVersion__c, 'P2.0'), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Draft'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'In Negotiation' ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Volume Discounts value is mandatory for P2.0 contracts. Please enter proper value or 0 (zero) for default.
